00006 class POpt{
00007 protected:
00008   poptContext con;
00009 public:
00010   // creation and deletion
00011   POpt(const char *name, int argc, const char **argv,
00012        const poptOption *options, int flags)
00013     {con = poptGetContext(name,argc,argv,options,flags);}
00014   POpt(const char *name, int argc, char **argv,
00015        const poptOption *options, int flags)
00016     {con = poptGetContext(name,argc,(const char **)argv,options,flags);}
00017   ~POpt()
00018     {poptFreeContext(con);}
00019 
00020   // functions for processing options
00021   int getNextOpt()
00022     {return(poptGetNextOpt(con));}
00023   void ignoreOptions()
00024     {while(getNextOpt() >= 0);}
00025   const char *getOptArg()
00026     {return(poptGetOptArg(con));}
00027   const char *strError(int error)
00028     {return(poptStrerror(error));}
00029   const char *badOption(int flags = POPT_BADOPTION_NOALIAS)
00030     {return(poptBadOption(con,flags));}
00031 
00032   // processing other arguments
00033   const char *getArg()
00034     {return(poptGetArg(con));}
00035   void ignoreArgs()
00036     {while(getArg());}
00037 };
